title: Netflix uses 3rd party advertisers that use tracking cookies to target ads.

tosdr.tldr: We use third-party advertising companies to serve ads. These companies may use information about your visits to this and other Web sites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you. If you would like more information about this practice and to know your choices about not having this information used by these companies click here .
